io.jeo.filter

Class BinaryFilter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.jeo.util.Predicate<T>
      • io.jeo.filter.Filter<T>
        • io.jeo.filter.BinaryFilter<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Comparison, Spatial

    public abstract class BinaryFilter<T>
extends Filter<T>
    Base class for filters that involve a left and a right expression.

      • left

        public Expression left()

      • right

        public Expression right()
        The right expression.

      • normalize

        public BinaryFilter<T> normalize()
        Normalizes the filter.

        A "normal" filter is one where one of the left or the right of the filter is a Property. This method returns null if the filter is not normal.

      • property

        public Property property()
        Returns the Property of a normal binary filter.
        See Also:
        normalize()

      • invert

        public abstract BinaryFilter<T> invert()
        Inverts the filter, swapping the left and right arguments.
